first.name: John
options: John, you have to fix this.
John, what should we do?
John, I need your help.
I'm scared, John.

repeat.name: John
options: John, you have to fix this.
John, what should we do?
John, I need your help.
I'm scared, John.

1_a.name: John
1_a.text: [color=yellow]Me? You want me to fix this?[/color]
options: Yes.
No.
I think you're the only one here who can.

1_a_1.name: John
1_a_1.text: [color=yellow]What do you imagine I can do to fix this?[/color]
options: You could use your enormous brain.
You could find someone who can help.
You could try talking to the computer.

1_a_1_a.name: John
options: A big thank you and a firm handshake.
The League's appreciation for all your hard work over the years.
That attitude isn't helping the team now, is it?

1_a_1_a_1.name: John
1_a_1_a_1.content: [color=yellow]Right. That will certainly make up for everything.[/color]

1_a_1_a_2_a.name: Lieutenant
1_a_1_a_2_a.content: Come on John, we all appreciate you here.

1_a_1_a_2_a_1.name: John
options: Smith
McCruthers
John.
BrzÄ™czyszczykiewicz.

1_a_1_a_3.name: John
1_a_1_a_3.content: [color=yellow]The team hasn't remembered my birthday for the past eight years.[/color]

1_a_1_b.name: John
1_a_1_b.content: [color=yellow]Oh of course, there's no chance I could possibly do anything.[/color]

1_a_1_c.name: John
1_a_1_c.content: [color=yellow]Do you know how to say "Computer: change language to English" in Russian?[/color]

1_a_1_c_a_1.name: John
1_a_1_c_a_1.content: [color=yellow]Do you know how to say "English" in Russian?[/color]

1_a_1_c_a_1_a_1.name: John
1_a_1_c_a_1_a_1.content: [color=yellow]Do you know any Russian at all?[/color]

1_a_2.name: John
1_a_2.content: [color=yellow]Then what are you bothering me for? Go and tell Barry to fix it.[/color]

1_a_3.name: John
options: You're our only hope!
We can't do it without you!
The fate of the League rests on your shoulders.

answerno.name: John
answerno.content: [color=yellow]Wow, it's so nice to be needed only when you can't ask the stupid computer for help first. The answer is no.[/color]

2_a.name: John
2_a.text: [color=yellow]I think you should get Barry to fix the problem he caused.[/color]
options: I don't think he can.
I don't think he wants to.
I think he's caused enough damage for one day.

2_a_1.name: John
2_a_1.content: [color=yellow]I'm sure he'll work it out eventually.[/color]

2_a_3.name: John
2_a_3.content: [color=yellow]He broke it, he can fix it. That's all I'm going to say about it.[/color]

3_a.name: John
3_a.text: [color=yellow]What on Canopus do you think I can do about this?[/color]
options: I thought you might have some ideas.
I don't know.
You're an engineer, aren't you?

3_a_3.name: John
3_a_3.content: [color=yellow]You could say I'm an "engineer". You could also say that I modelled a nuclear reactor out of pinebark when I was 12, I have a first-class degree in quantum propulsion systems, and I was headhunted by the Australian National Astrophysics League before I'd even taken my final exams with promises of overseeing the biggest and most powerful engines humanity had ever devised.[/color]

3_a_3_a.name: John
3_a_3_a.content: [color=yellow]Then these stupid AI computers came along and now I press buttons all day asking the computer to find answers to things I devoted my life to studying, and the only tech I'm allowed to go anywhere near is the coffee machine.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1.name: John
3_a_3_a_1.content: [color=yellow]And we ran out of coffee three years ago.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a.name: John
options: I bet you could fix it.
Can you think of some way to fix this?

3_a_3_a_1_a_1.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_1.text: [color=yellow]I bet you I'm not going to.[/color]
options: What if you align the phase manifold?
What if you check the combustion seals?
What about lubricating the flux probes?
What if you restart the synaptic motivators?
What about flooding the vac inhibitors with sodium trihydroflurodoxetine to trigger a hydrolygesic feedback decouplement?

3_a_3_a_1_a_1_b.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_1_b.content: [color=yellow]I am NOT going into the reactor chamber again.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a_1_c.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_1_c.content: [color=yellow]We used the last of the WD40 on the squeaky chair in the comms room.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a_1_d.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_1_d.content: [color=yellow]I don't think I could begin to explain in simple terms why that wouldn't work.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a_1_e.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_1_e.content: [color=yellow]Yes I thought about that, but we don't have enough methylaluniminestricate to counter to secondary neurotrioxin-3 inversion.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a_2.name: John
3_a_3_a_1_a_2.content: [color=yellow]I don't think a lowly "engineer" has any business fiddling with a G38k Kermit Quantum AI Nanoflux Supercomputer.[/color]

3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a.content: I bet you really hate that computer.

3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a.content: I bet you're disappointed that the League reduced you to a button-pushing errand-boy

3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a_1_a.content: I bet you feel like you really wasted your youth on all that study.

3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.name: Lieutenant
3_a_3_a_1_a_2_a_1_a_1_a_1_a.content: I bet you'd really like to show this computer how you really feel.

smash_3.name: John
smash_3.content: [color=yellow]Hey! It looks like . . . |that's fixed it a bit![/color]@[John has fixed the computer interface by 10% ]
